channel.title: CacheDownloader problem [PI]
channel.description:
Hello, Ive been having those errors. No fix ATM! Anybody knows the fix?
When I unzip the files manually the client works. But when I upload it to Dropbox and try to download it it doesnt work
Current errors
[CODE] java.util.zip.ZipException: error in opening zip file at java.util.zip.ZipFile.open(Native Method) at java.util.zip.ZipFile.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.util.zip.ZipFile.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.util.zip.ZipFile.<init>(Unknown Source) at Update.unZipFile(Update.java:53) at Update.<init>(Update.java:29) at client.streamLoaderForName(client.java:4795) at client.startUp(client.java:9134) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:38) at client.run(client.java:6105) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
[/CODE]
PS: Yes, ive zipped the files and not the folders Yes, its zipped as .zip Yes, its uploaded to dropbox Yes, Ive looked into different threads Yes, I can unzip it normally fine
Link for the cache http://dl.dropbox.com/s/gmog5rvg9sun6vx/PandaCache.zip

item.title: CacheDownloader problem [PI]
item.dc:creator: @amiroslo amiroslo
item.description:
@amiroslo wrote:

RandQm:

Maybe it’s corrupt after being downloaded?

Yes could be, any clue how to fix that?

Camballer:

Instead of “http://dl.dropbox.com/s/gmog5rvg9sun6vx/PandaCache.zip” use “http://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/s/gmog5rvg9sun6vx/PandaCache.zip”

Still same problem

Read full topic

item.title: CacheDownloader problem [PI]
item.dc:creator: @amiroslo amiroslo
item.description:
@amiroslo wrote:

Hello,
Ive been having those errors. No fix ATM!
Anybody knows the fix?

When I unzip the files manually the client works. But when I upload it to Dropbox and try to download it it doesnt work

Current errors

[CODE]
java.util.zip.ZipException: error in opening zip file
at java.util.zip.ZipFile.open(Native Method)
at java.util.zip.ZipFile.(Unknown Source)
at java.util.zip.ZipFile.(Unknown Source)
at java.util.zip.ZipFile.(Unknown Source)
at Update.unZipFile(Update.java:53)
at Update.(Update.java:29)
at client.streamLoaderForName(client.java:4795)
at client.startUp(client.java:9134)
at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:38)
at client.run(client.java:6105)
at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)

[/CODE]

PS:
Yes, ive zipped the files and not the folders
Yes, its zipped as .zip
Yes, its uploaded to dropbox
Yes, Ive looked into different threads
Yes, I can unzip it normally fine

Link for the cache
http://dl.dropbox.com/s/gmog5rvg9sun6vx/PandaCache.zip

Read full topic
